name: Verify Authentication Minigame Completion
description: Validates that the Authentication.kp4 file can be run and the face recognition minigame completes successfully.
testObjective: Ensure authentication minigame functions correctly and progresses tutorial upon completion.
author: Dominic Brooks
preconditions: Authentication.kp4 file is visible in Temp directory

steps.expected: Modal opens displaying Title: 'Authentication', [Run] button, and [X] close option
Modal closes without running the file

steps.action: Click Authentication.kp4 again and click [Run] button
Read the minigame prompt: 'Click [E] when a face is displayed'
Wait for a face to appear on screen
Observe completion and check for new files
steps.expected: Minigame ends, modal closes, notification indicates 'Next Steps.kp4' is available
New file 'Next Steps.kp4' appears in Temp section
